name: Bass Surf
description:
In This Game You Can Play Your Favorite Music of your Device while you Control a Little Spaceship. When The Music Play A Powerful Bass, The Velocity Increase. With different difficulties, you should avoid the white "X"s and Collect Colorful Cubes to Get the Best Score.

AVAILABLE FOR WINDOWS AND ANDROID.

We recommend to use a Music with Powerful Bass to get a Best Experience, Music like Electronic, Trap and Dubstep.

This Game doesn't Includes Songs, You must add your own songs from your device.

____________________________________

Just Download the ZIP File, Extract it and Copy/Move your Favorite Music to the Songs Folder.

File Extensions By Platform: .WAV For Windows && .MP3 FOR ANDROID

IMPORTANT FOR ANDROID: To Add Songs you need to copy/move your favorite songs to the next Path => "storage/0/Android/data/com.basssurf.game/files/Songs/", If the Songs Folder doesn't exist, create it. (The Path maybe changes if you install or move the game in a External SD)

IMPORTANT FOR WINDOWS: Convert your MP3 files to WAV with a Converter Software or a Online Converter Software, NOT CHANGE THE MP3 FILE EXTENSION TO WAV or you will get an error in the Game.
